title: Bug 114905 - Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter. After modifying the default value, the list box does not retain the change.
EB: The list box in the report parameter should retain the default value after it has been modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Change the default value in the list box.
3. Observe that the modified default value is not retained.
